text: Sipas Alloh ʙa Zoti ʙuzurgvoras savgand jod namud, ki nest amr cunon ki onho gumon meʙarand, ki onho mu'minonand va ʙa'd az on ʙa hukmi tu rozi namesavand va turo dar hamai ixtilofoti xud hokim qaror namedihand. Va ʙojad malole az hukmi tu dar dili xud nadosta va komilan taslim ʙosand. (Ixtijor namudani hukmi Rasul sallallohu alajhi va sallam va rozi ʙudan va taslim sudan ʙa on ci ovardaast az nazdi Alloh dar hama holathoi hajot az nisonai sidqi imon ast)
